description.ko: 빛과 물질이 우주의 깊은 정적 속으로 사라지는 우주 끝자락에 대한 탐구입니다.
description.en: An exploration into the furthest reaches of the universe where light and matter dissolve into the eternal silence of the cosmic deep.

prompt: A hyper-realistic cinematic shot of a massive black hole at the center of a dark nebula, shimmering iridescent event horizon, swirling cosmic dust, deep indigo and obsidian color palette, volumetric lighting, 8k resolution, ethereal atmosphere.
